None.Name: Tainted Provoke
None.Description: Activate to taunt an enemy unit. The targeted unit will then be forced to only attack Lightblade and cannot be controlled any more for 10 seconds. It will additionally be weakened and deal 50% less damage. Reusable every 20 seconds.

None.Name: Righteous Fury
None.Description: Deals 50% more damage against Undead creatures.
